response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,500. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 11500}
